sentence.Network_en: She threw down her basket and intoned a peasant dirge.
sentence.Network_cn: 她撂下菜篮,唱起庄稼人的哀歌.

sentence.Network_en: Captain, make sure that the band plays a dirge.
sentence.Network_cn: 上尉, 一定让乐队为他们演奏一首表达我们哀思的挽歌.

sentence.Network_en: The stranger, after listening for a moment, joined in the mournful dirge.
sentence.Network_cn: 听了一会儿后这个陌生人也跟著唱起了悲哀的挽歌.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 狂派_百度百科 ... Thrust 冲锋 Dirge 挽歌（dirge） Ramjet 喷气机.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... demise 驾崩，死亡 dirge 挽歌，哀乐 drape 披盖.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... dire 可怕的 dirge 哀歌 disaffect 使不满；使不忠.
《Magic of Faerun》 法术详述zz - 饮水思源 ... 次元锁( Dimensional Lock) 送葬曲( Dirge) 伪装不死生物( Disguise Undead).

list.abs: The radio played dirges all day long ., 广播电台整天都在播放哀乐.
it's never easy to say goodbye but when the time comes , more Britons are choosing a pop ditty over a mournful dirge .说再见从来都不是件容易的事，但当这一刻来临之时，更多的英国人现在倾向于选择流行的歌谣而不是哀伤的挽歌。
A series of variations on a traditional dirge or martial theme for the highland bagpipes ., 风笛变奏曲根据传统的挽歌或战争主题 , 用高地风笛演奏的一系列变奏曲.
the sky sang a dirge and the windblown sand took on strange shapes .天空哀鸣着一曲挽歌，风吹拂起沙尘，展现出奇特的形状。

I certainly do not want fellow home unable to extricate themselves immersed in grief , but in this day , I still want to have to sing a dirge for them , and that quiet and sad song .我当然不想家乡的父老乡亲沉浸于悲伤中不能自拔，但是在这样的日子里，我还是希望有能够为他们唱一首哀歌，那首歌安静而又悲伤。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting the Office for the Dead): from Latin dirige! (imperative) 'direct!', the first word of an antiphon (Ps. 5:8) used in the Latin Office for the Dead

entry.def: A dirge is a slow, sad song or piece of music. Dirges are sometimes performed at funerals.

example.tran: 哀婉的乐曲，《爱尔兰挽歌》

means.word_mean: 1. a song or hymn of mourning composed or performed as a memorial to a dead person

auth_sentence.content: Initial listens may paint it as a bit of a pretentious dirge, but dive into it and soon warmth and light flood in.
auth_sentence.res_content: Initial listens may paint it as a bit of a pretentious dirge, but dive into it and soon warmth and light flood in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Initial listens may paint it as a bit of a pretentious dirge, but dive into it and soon warmth and light flood in.

auth_sentence.content: The prog-rock dirge of "I Remember California" bears gloomy witness to a world losing itself in a blur of accelerating change.
auth_sentence.res_content: The prog-rock dirge of "I Remember California" bears gloomy witness to a world losing itself in a blur of accelerating change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The prog-rock dirge of "I Remember California" bears gloomy witness to a world losing itself in a blur of accelerating change.

auth_sentence.content: The nine-song disc kicks off with Smog a hypnotic, futuristic dirge with fantastic vocals from Conboy.
